Netherlands beat USA to seal their spot. © Getty
The Netherlands and Zimbabwe won their respective T20 Qualifier B semi-finals against the USA and Papua New Guinea to seal their berths at the 2022 T… [+4191 chars]

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Final two teams confirm places in ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022 - International Cricket Council
articles.description: Netherlands and Zimbabwe booked their place in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022 after seeing off USA and PNG respectively in semi-finals of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup Qualifier B.
